pageProduct.name: Olay Luminous Niacinamide + Vitamin C Sheet Mask
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Olay Luminous Niacinamide + Vitamin C Super Serum, for spot-less, even skin.

Olay Luminous Niacinamide + Vitamin C Sheet Mask  Reduces Dark Spots For Even Glow From First Use. Instantly Reduces The Appearance Of Dark Spots.

Olay Luminous Niacinamide + Vitamin C Sheet Mask is specifically designed with a special elastic substrate to ensure optimal fit in a ultra-soft sheet for a relaxing and refreshing experience. It contains 1/2 the actives in a bottle of Olay Luminous Niacinamide + Vitamin C Super Serum.?In synergy, 99% Pure Grade Niacinamide and Vitamin C improve skin brightness and reduces the appearance of dark spots for an even glow.

Size: 1 Pack

KEY FEATURES

• FORMULA/TECHNOLOGY
• RICH ACTIVES: 1 SHEET CONTAINS 1/2 THE ACTIVES IN A BOTTLE.
• TENSION-FIT DESIGN: OPTIMAL FIT WITH SPECIAL ELASTIC SUBSTRATE.
• ULTRA-SOFT SHEET: FOR A RELAXING AND REFRESHING EXPERIENCE.
• FORMULATED WITHOUT: SULPHATES, PARABENS, PHTHALATES, PETROLATUM, MINERAL OILS^
• ^excludes impurities due to manufacturing process.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes.If contact occurs, rinse eyes with water

Ingredients

Water, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Disodium Phosphate, Titanium Dioxide, Sodium Phosphate, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance

Directions

Stretch both sides of the mask to fully cover the face and press gently to ensure a good fit. Leave the mask on for 15 minutes then gently remove it
